name: moliere100
description: website allowing the notation of a text written in french from the site or imported from a text file. Based on spelling, grammar and punctuation errors, a score out of 100 is assigned to the text. Errors are highlighted in order to correct them easily and to obtain a better mark at the next correction.
author: Marion BOURLITIO, Alexandre ANDRIAMIHAMINA, Soufiane SBAI, Corentin JEZIERSKI
